channel.title: Delta attack lag
channel.description: It's not refreshSkills() causing the lag I have :palm: its the packet being sent 1 tick late How to fix this?

item.title: Delta attack lag
item.dc:creator: @Pker_DX Pker DX
item.description:
@Pker_DX wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:13, topic:543334”][quote author=Pker DX link=topic=662206.msg4426153#msg4426153 date=1400940418]

You’re not going to like what I’m about to say and I know this is going against the general opinion in this thread, but you should just rewrite your combat implementation.

I may try this,

EDIT
ANY MOD MAY CLOSE THIS, I HAVE FIXED IT.
[/quote]
Like on a serious note, you should post a tutorial on it. More people who are into delta are going to want something like that.[/quote]
I cant remember how I did it

Read full topic

item.title: Delta attack lag
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“sertan8, post:8, topic:543334”]ive found you one. https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,636421.0/nowap.html

the funny thing is that the user dan released this[/quote]

That’s why I’m telling him to not use it I wasted like a year or so on delta and right when I switched to a better source like Hyperion you become surrounded with well done/documented code.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta attack lag
item.dc:creator: @Pker_DX Pker DX
item.description:
@Pker_DX wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:4, topic:543334”][quote author=Pker DX link=topic=662206.msg4426060#msg4426060 date=1400882256]

re-write your combat. Delta’s is literally terrible and all over the place. Like seriously cramming all combat into one java file is ridiculous and more into it that file is used for other things also(talking about the client.java)

I still dont understand why there is a 1 tick delay between the attacked player and the attacking player actually seeing the attack
[/quote]
because ur combat is shit lol stop using delta[/quote]
my accuracys are good, my maxhits are good, this is the only problem. once i find my way round this, i’ll be tweaking it until I see fit.

Read full topic
